column2: To Sheridan it was Tom o' Bedlam singing while the house burned; and he did not tarry to enjoy the melody, but went into his own room and locked the door.

column2: My time's here at last, he said, as they sat together in the melancholy gas-light of the room which had been denuded of its piano.
